name: Derby Rumble
description:
Derby Rumble is a game that will be sure to bring a challenge to the player fighting off many enemies and added with difficult bosses throughout the game but not too hard where you'd want to rip your hair out.

There will be three worlds that will range the difficulty
levels of the game. To traverse these worlds, play a fun character that
has a powerful weapon to sure put a dent in the numbers of enemies. It's
a fast paced arcade game so also expect to find situations that'll make
you quick on the throttle to react.

If you do end up giving it a go, leave feedback or anything that'll help fix problems or add improvements to your experience and what you think of it. Happy
Blasting!
